answerText: Tropic of Cancer[10] Tropic of Cancer was written by this man, who followed it up with Black Spring and Tropic of Capricorn. This lover of Anais Nin later became a famous critic and social commentator.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Yale A | 11 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Its protagonist has an affair with Tania and hangs out with his misogynistic friend Van Norden while staying with a soldier named Fillmore. For 10 points each: [10] Name this 1934 novel, famous for its obscenity, a fictionalized account of the author's days in Paris.
